alert.note: Alert for Baker; Calhoun; Clay; Dougherty; Early; Miller (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 21 at 11:16PM EDT until July 22 at 12:00AM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Miller County in southwestern Georgia... Dougherty County in southwestern Georgia... Southeastern Clay County in southwestern Georgia... Baker County in southwestern Georgia... Calhoun County in southwestern Georgia... Early County in southwestern Georgia... * Until midnight EDT. * At 1115 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles southwest of Albany to near Arlington to near Taylor, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Colquitt, Newton, Morgan, Blakely, Putney, Albany, Edison, Arlington, Leary, Walker, Douglasville, Centerville, Gordon, Damascus, Jakin, Bluffton, Iveys Mill, Radium Springs, Parksville and Rock Hill. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Baker; Calhoun; Clay; Dougherty; Early; Miller
